channel.title: Auto Spawn Problems
channel.description:
Well i think it is a problem with the auto spawn2 and stuff. When i start to either add to much to auto spawn or to much of the same monster i get this
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1 31 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn2(NPCHandler.java:862) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:24) at server.main(server.java:26)
I wanna know if I can do something so I can put my monsters in because now I cant put any in at all.

item.title: Auto Spawn Problems
item.dc:creator: @Something_all_OVer Something all OVer
item.description:
@Something_all_OVer wrote:

the error, what would that be the auto spawn stuff?

still got no realy clue to what u said to do buy i seemed to fix it.
Just had to rewrite a line probly what you said in a better way lol.

Thanks Dannieb u rule and so do ur Tutorials, saves me a bunch of thinking time lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Auto Spawn Problems

item.description:
@danieb wrote:

go to the error press backspace to bring it back to the start and pres tab
